data.title: Printing shipping labels for e-commerce orders in the PitneyShip mobile app
data.meta_description: You can print one or more shipping labels for your e-commerce orders in the PitneyShip mobile app.
data.text:
You can print one or more shipping labels for your e-commerce orders in the PitneyShip mobile app.

Printing a single shipping label

Printing multiple shipping labels

Printing a single shipping label

Tap Orders.

From the Unshipped Orders screen, tap the order you wish to print a label for.

Fill in the required fields.

Tap Print.

On the Label Options screen, select Roll from the Select Print Size field.

(Optional) Enter a memo in the Memo field.

Tap Print.

Printing multiple shipping labels

Tap Orders.

Tap Select.

All your Ready to Ship orders will now be visible. Select the orders you wish to print shipping labels for.

Tap Print Labels.

On the Label Options screen, select Roll from the Select Print Size field.

(Optional) Enter a memo in the Memo field.

Tap Print.

Related topics

Saving an e-commerce order in the PitneyShip mobile app
